string.text: You want to hear a story? I got tales to tell! Sit down and listen.
Have you heard of the bug fixing wars of the past? No?
Well, I was there when it happened. Cruel times!
But I survived and fought every day against uneven odds.
Wow, you are an amazing veteran.
I don't care. Give update, plz!
You seem like you need some assistance for your project. Let me aid you!
You better not be a manhunter, though.
I split skulls ever since I've been born!
If you think you are smarter than me, you are wrong. I outsmarted pigs when I was a child!
I have drunk from many skulls and I will drink from many more. So do not stand in my way when I find a nice head on my next preys shoulder.
You seem like a funny one. Want to come with me?
You know I think gotta go. Farewell!
